title: Community food security for caregiver households
description: Community food security for caregiver households
content:
Scenario: Community food security for caregiver households
    Given James's household faces food insecurity on reduced income
    And care demands make food shopping difficult
    When the community_elohim assesses food security
    Then food assistance should be available through care economy
    And delivery should accommodate caregiver constraints
    And food should meet David's specialized nutritional needs
    And access should be dignified and based on care contributions
    And community should ensure caregiver households have food security
